plot: After suffering sudden separation his wife n, Benito relies on his cu ated Ferm n, which proposes to alleviate this deep pain going to spend a weekend together his people, Villanueva de los Molinos, a small town situated in full Castilian region of La Mancha plain. Once arrived at its destination, match n Ferm childhood friends n: Marcelino and his brother Higinio, which try to entertain them and be the hosts and cicerones all n want. Ferm n, which told you his friend countless times Wonderland of his people, the verve and kindness of its people and ease treatment of their women, trying to make the experience is quite comforting for your desolate compa ero at the time that, for l, suppose a reunion with his distant and forgotten quasi puberty. But in the course of the weekend show n a series of situations that dwellers due n faced with uneven results. Is the life of peoples as lica buc as we believe? Are its so simple and hospitable people as you paint them?
